meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family, typically having umbels of small flowers.
meanings.sent1: The umbellifer in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent2: I learned about different types of umbellifers in my botany class.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly used the umbellifer instead of parsley in the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like the delicate umbels of an umbellifer.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the umbellifer filled the air with a sweet aroma.

meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the family Apiaceae, characterized by compound leaves and umbrella-shaped clusters of flowers.
meanings.sent1: The farmer cultivated various umbellifers on his land.
meanings.sent2: The field was a sea of green, dotted with colorful umbellifers.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella-shaped clusters of the umbellifer provided shade for the tiny insects.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like the compound leaves of an umbellifer.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the umbrella-shaped clusters on the umbellifer mesmerized the onlookers.
